summary: Enter the city of whiterun as a group of "bandits" takeover.
descriptionHtml: Around the time of the dragon awakenings, the jarl of whiterun hires a ruthless group of assassins and bandits to uncover a series of thefts and pickpockets, but asfar as the stories goes, they overstay their welcome and make their own rules as they start to rob the people of the hold. Petty thefts, breaking in houses, pickpocketing. What will you do? Will you leave them be and let the story go on, or will you grab your sword and try to stop them?
author: Milawh
